flight_phase_details: Cruise at 10,000 ft, preparing for descent.
atc_communication: [Callsign], PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN, PAN-PAN. We have a green hydraulic system failure. We are fully controllable but will have a slow configuration and will require a gravity gear extension. Requesting vectors for a 20-mile final to allow for the checklist. Emergency services on standby would be appreciated.
